name: R (via apt)
description: Installs the latest R, some R packages, and needed dependencies. Note: May require source code compilation for some R packages.

vscodeRSupport.description: Install R packages to make vscode-R work. lsp means the `languageserver` package, full means lsp plus the `httpgd` package.

installRMarkdown.description: Install the `rmarkdown` R package. It is required for R Markdown or Quarto documentation.

installJupyterlab.description: Install and setup JupyterLab (via `python3 -m pip`). JupyterLab is a web-based interactive development environment for notebooks.

installRadian.description: Install radian (via `python3 -m pip`). radian is an R console with multiline editing and rich syntax highlight.

installVscDebugger.description: Install the `vscDebugger` R package from the GitHub repo. It is required for the VSCode-R-Debugger.
